description.value:
If user has Common Lore (Machine Cult), can bear this symbol to gain +10 to Fellowsihp Tests with Tech-Priests and Followers of the Machine God. The Greater Symbol also contains a set of Multikeys and grants +10 to Security Tests to disablealarms and commune with machine spirits.

Requirements

Tech Priests Only

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: 12000 T
